      <Validation BaseType="isodatetime" MinValue="" MaxValue="" MaxLength="" InputMask=""/>

      <Name QualifierID="Qualifier root">ValidForShop</Name>
      <Validation BaseType="text" MinValue="" MaxValue="" MaxLength="100" InputMask=""/>

    <Attribute ID="ELFRLovAttr" MultiValued="false" ProductMode="Normal" FullTextIndexed="false" ExternallyMaintained="true" Derived="false" HierarchicalFiltering="false" ClassificationHierarchicalFiltering="false" Mandatory="false">
      <Name QualifierID="Qualifier root">ELFRLovAttr</Name>
      <ListOfValueLink ListOfValueID="ELFRLargeLOV"/>
      <AttributeGroupLink AttributeGroupID="ELFRAttrGroup"/>
      <UserTypeLink UserTypeID="Item"/>
    </Attribute>

    <Attribute ID="RetailPrice" MultiValued="false" ProductMode="Normal" FullTextIndexed="false" ExternallyMaintained="false" Derived="false" Mandatory="false">
      <Name QualifierID="Qualifier root">Retail Price</Name>
      <Validation BaseType="number" MinValue="0.01" MaxValue="50000" MaxLength="" InputMask="9999#.##"/>
      <MetaData>
        <Value AttributeID="27715ad5-b32c-46de-9819-a6f4d2916ef9">Retail across all markets where your product is being sold by comparable retailers. Only values between 0.01 and 50000.00 are valid. Only data in the standard currency format #####.## will be accepted.</Value>
      </MetaData>
      <AttributeGroupLink AttributeGroupID="Global"/>
      <UserTypeLink UserTypeID="Family"/>
      <UserTypeLink UserTypeID="Item"/>
      <UserTypeLink UserTypeID="Variant"/>
    </Attribute>

    <Attribute ID="ELFRFamilyAttr" MultiValued="false" ProductMode="Normal" FullTextIndexed="false" ExternallyMaintained="false" Derived="false" Mandatory="false">
      <Name QualifierID="Qualifier root">ELFRFamilyAttr</Name>
      <Validation BaseType="text" MinValue="" MaxValue="" MaxLength="100" InputMask=""/>
      <AttributeGroupLink AttributeGroupID="ELFRAttrGroup"/>
      <UserTypeLink UserTypeID="Family"/>
    </Attribute>

    <Attribute ID="GTIN" MultiValued="false" ProductMode="Normal" FullTextIndexed="false" ExternallyMaintained="false" Derived="false" Mandatory="false">
      <Name QualifierID="Qualifier root">GTIN</Name>
      <Validation BaseType="text" MinValue="" MaxValue="" MaxLength="" InputMask=""/>
      <MetaData>
        <Value AttributeID="27715ad5-b32c-46de-9819-a6f4d2916ef9">14 digit item level identifier. Can be input as 0 + EAN or 00 + UPC. Visit www.gs1.org for additional details. NOTE: This attribute will NOT be editable once the item is submitted successfully</Value>
      </MetaData>
      <AttributeGroupLink AttributeGroupID="Global"/>
      <UserTypeLink UserTypeID="Item"/>
      <UserTypeLink UserTypeID="Variant"/>
    </Attribute>

    <Attribute ID="ELFRAttr2" MultiValued="false" ProductMode="Normal" FullTextIndexed="false" ExternallyMaintained="false" Derived="false" Mandatory="false">

      <Validation BaseType="text" MinValue="" MaxValue="" MaxLength="25" InputMask=""/>

      <UserTypeLink UserTypeID="Variant"/>

    <Attribute ID="ELFRAttr1" MultiValued="false" ProductMode="Normal" FullTextIndexed="false" ExternallyMaintained="false" Derived="false" Mandatory="false">
      <Name QualifierID="Qualifier root">ELFRAttr1</Name>
      <Validation BaseType="number" MinValue="" MaxValue="999999" MaxLength="" InputMask=""/>
      <AttributeGroupLink AttributeGroupID="ELFRAttrGroup"/>
      <UserTypeLink UserTypeID="Variant"/>
    </Attribute>

    <Attribute ID="ELFRCalc" MultiValued="false" ProductMode="Normal" FullTextIndexed="false" ExternallyMaintained="false" Derived="true" Mandatory="false">
      <Name QualifierID="Qualifier root">ELFRCalc</Name>
      <Validation BaseType="text" MinValue="" MaxValue="" MaxLength="100" InputMask=""/>

    <Attribute ID="ELFRISODate" MultiValued="false" ProductMode="Normal" FullTextIndexed="false" ExternallyMaintained="false" Derived="false" Mandatory="false">

    <Attribute ID="UPC" MultiValued="false" ProductMode="Normal" FullTextIndexed="false" ExternallyMaintained="false" Derived="false" Mandatory="false">

<?xml version="1.0"?>
<ExportManagerConfig Version="2" Name="LAAL_JSON" ContextID="Context1" WorkspaceID="Main" UseContextLocale="false" ResolveInlineRefs="false" ExportDerivedAttrs="false" EffectiveDate="" EffectiveDateTimeZoneID="America/New_York" ECatalogID="" SelfContainedReferences="false" VersionID="" ScheduleDate="" ProcessTemplate="Exporter" ContentMode="" ExecutionMode="" InheritProductData="false" LeafProductExport="true" ExportSelectedProducts="false" isSorted="false">
  <ProductSelection>
    <URL>step://product?id=107407</URL>
  </ProductSelection>
  <Format Name="GenericJSON">
    <Parameter Name="Template">{
  "products": [
    {
      "__type": "__record",
      "id": "__target ID",
      "name": "__target Name",
      "values": [
        {
          "attributeID": "__target",
          "value": "__target"
        }
      ],
      "priceRanges": [
        {
          "dcId": "__target",
         "from": "__target",
         "to": "__target",
          "price": "__target"
        }
      ]
    }
  ]
}</Parameter>
    <Parameter Name="FormatDocument">true</Parameter>
  </Format>
  <ProductMapping SelectedURLType="product">
    <Map Target="ID">
      <Trigger><IDSource Aspect="ID"/></Trigger>
      <Expression><IDSource Aspect="ID"/></Expression>
    </Map>
    <Map Target="Name">
      <Trigger><NameSource/></Trigger>
      <Expression><NameSource/></Expression>
    </Map>
    <CompositeMap Target="values">
      <Trigger><AttributeSource AttributeID="*" Aspect="ValueAndUnit" AttributeGroupID="Attribute group root" MultiValueSeparator=";"/></Trigger>
    <Map Target="attributeID">
      <Expression><AttributeSource AttributeID="*" Aspect="ID" AttributeGroupID="Attribute group root" MultiValueSeparator=";"/></Expression>
    </Map>
    <Map Target="value">
      <Expression><AttributeSource AttributeID="*" Aspect="ValueAndUnit" AttributeGroupID="Attribute group root" MultiValueSeparator=";"/></Expression>
    </Map>
    </CompositeMap>
    <CompositeMap Target="priceRanges">
      <Trigger><DataContainerSource DataContainerTypeID="ItemPrices" Aspect="ValueAndUnit" MultiValueSeparator=";" MultiDataSeparator="#"/></Trigger>
    <Map Target="dcId">
      <Expression><DataContainerIDSource Aspect="ID" DataContainerTypeID="ItemPrices" PullData="true" MultiDataSeparator="#"/></Expression>
    </Map>
    <Map Target="from">
      <Expression><DataContainerAttributeSource AttributeID="ItemPriceFrom" DataContainerTypeID="ItemPrices" Aspect="ValueAndUnit" MultiValueSeparator=";" MultiDataSeparator="#"/></Expression>
    </Map>
    <Map Target="to">
      <Expression><DataContainerAttributeSource AttributeID="ItemPriceTo" DataContainerTypeID="ItemPrices" Aspect="ValueAndUnit" MultiValueSeparator=";" MultiDataSeparator="#"/></Expression>
    </Map>
    <Map Target="price">
      <Expression><DataContainerAttributeSource AttributeID="ItemPrice" DataContainerTypeID="ItemPrices" Aspect="ValueAndUnit" MultiValueSeparator=";" MultiDataSeparator="#"/></Expression>
    </Map>
    </CompositeMap>
  </ProductMapping>
  <Delivery Name="Email">
    <Parameter Name="Address">laal@stibosystems.com</Parameter>
    <Parameter Name="SubjectText">Product data export</Parameter>
    <Parameter Name="BodyText">Please find enclosed the latest product data delivery</Parameter>
    <Parameter Name="Zip">ZipNo</Parameter>
    <Parameter Name="FileNameTemplate">$filename-$timestamp(yyyy-MM-dd_HH.mm.ss).$extension</Parameter>
  </Delivery>
</ExportManagerConfig>
 -->
